content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I appreciate your interest. As the landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains from renting out this apartment, so I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price. I am a responsible and dependable tenant, so I am sure I will take good care of the apartment. I am also looking for a long-term lease agreement. How about we agree on a price of 500 Euros per month?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I understand that you are looking for a lower rental price, and I appreciate your willingness to take care of the apartment. However, as the landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains from renting out this apartment. While I am open to discussing the rental price, I am not willing to agree to a price of 500 Euros per month for a 25 square meter apartment. I would be happy to negotiate further to find a rental price that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand, I am willing to negotiate. How about we agree on a price of 650 Euros per month?

I am also looking for a lease agreement that lasts for at least one year. What do you say?

I would like to clarify that I am a responsible and dependable tenant, so I am sure I will take good care of the apartment.

I would also like to mention that I am a student, so I am looking for a flexible lease agreement that allows me to renew my lease agreement after the initial one year period.

I would also like to mention that I am looking for a lease agreement that includes a clause that allows me to sublet the apartment if needed, as I may need to move out of the country for a semester or two.

I hope this additional information helps you understand my needs better.

TERMINATE
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
I understand your willingness to negotiate and I appreciate your additional information. However, I am still not willing to agree to a rental price of 650 Euros per month for a 25 square meter apartment. As the landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains from renting out this apartment.

I understand that you are a responsible and dependable tenant, and I appreciate your willingness to take care of the apartment. However, I am not willing to agree to a lease agreement that lasts for only one year. As the landlord, I am looking for a long-term lease agreement that provides stability for both of us.

I understand that you are a student and may need to sublet the apartment in the future. However, I am not willing to include a subletting clause in the lease agreement. As the landlord, I am looking for a lease agreement that provides me with the security of knowing that the apartment will be occupied for the duration of the lease term.

I hope this clarifies my position. If you would like to continue the negotiation, please let me know what rental price and lease term you are willing to agree to.
name: Heinrich Heine
